    modules/data/ivx-io/enhancer.states.inputs.js

    import { iVXioInputEnhancer } from "./enhancer.inputs.js";
import { iVXioStateEnhancerUtilities } from "./enhancer.states.utilities.js";

/**
 * Enhances the previous Single Input and Multiple Inputs states
 * to one input state that iVXjs will use.
 */
export class iVXioEnhanceInputStates{
    
    /**
     * Attaches the former input state data that needs enhancement 
     * and the current experience that will be used to enhance 
     * this state.
     * @param {object} stateData - state data to be enhanced 
     * @param {iVXioExperience} experience - experience to be used to 
     * enhance this input state.
     */
    constructor(stateData, experience){
        /**
         * Input state data to be enhanced to work 
         * with iVXjs 
         * 
         * @type {object}
         */
        this.stateData = stateData;
        
        /**
         * An iVXio Experience object to help enhancing this input 
         * state 
         * 
         * @type {iVXioExperience}
         */
        this.experience = experience;
        
        /**
         * A set of global utility functions to help with creating 
         * states.
         * 
         * @type {iVXioStateEnhancerUtilities}
         */
        this.utilities = new iVXioStateEnhancerUtilities();
        
        /**
         * Enhances an array of inputs to be used with iVXjs.
         * 
         * @type {iVXioInputEnhancer}
         */
        this.iVXioInputEnhancer = iVXioInputEnhancer;
    }
    
    /**
     * Restructures and sets up the necessary information to create an 
     * iVXjs input state. It also runs all enhancements on the inputs defined 
     * in this state.
     * 
     * @type {object} 
     */
    get state(){
        let {stateData} = this;
        let enhancedInputState = stateData; 
        let {inputs : storyInputs} = this.experience.story;
        let defaultInputs = [
                {
                    inputKey : stateData.inputKey, 
                    required : stateData.required, 
                    buttonData : stateData.buttonData, 
                    type : stateData.displayType
                } 
            ];
        let defaultHeaderName = storyInputs[stateData.inputKey] ? storyInputs[stateData.inputKey].name : "";
        
        let {
            inputs, 
            onSubmit, 
            headerText =  defaultHeaderName,
            header,
            onInputReady = []
        } = stateData;
        
       
        
        enhancedInputState.onSubmit = onSubmit ? onSubmit : [];
        enhancedInputState.header = header ? header : {
            html : `${headerText}`
        };
        enhancedInputState.inputs =  new this.iVXioInputEnhancer(inputs ? inputs : defaultInputs, this.experience, stateData.type).inputs;
        enhancedInputState.onInputReady = onInputReady;
        enhancedInputState.type = "input";
        
        this.utilities.addTransitionEvents(enhancedInputState.onSubmit,  enhancedInputState.onInputReady, stateData);
        
        return enhancedInputState;
        
    }
};
    Generated by ESDoc(0.4.7)
